title: 239 11 "The Straw Hat Pirates Are the Culprits? The Protectors of the City of Water!"Transliteration: "Hannin wa mugiwara kaizokudan? Mizu no miyako no yōjinbo" (Japanese:犯人は麦わら海賊団?水の都の用心棒) Morio Hatano Hirohiko Kamisaka July 31, 2005(2005-07-31)[381][382] February 2, 2014
